mapper.select: SELECT user_no, email, name, mobile, sns, signup_dt, birthyear, age, gender, postcode, address, detail_address, extra_address FROM user_t ORDER BY signup_dt DESC
SELECT user_no, email, name, mobile, sns, signup_dt, birthyear, age, gender, postcode, address, detail_address, extra_address FROM user_t WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_t SET name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, gender = #{gender}, birthyear = #{birthyear}, signup_dt = #{signupDt}, postcode = #{postcode}, address = #{address}, extra_address = #{extraAddress}, detail_address = #{detailAddress} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
